nefra.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • nefra.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game holds all the information necessary to "play" a game, it also works out the match fees payable to the referees and adds it both to the clubs and to the referees fees.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int game_id,
            Club home,
            Club away,
            Division division,
            int round,
            int year,
            Referee main,
            Referee ar1,
            Referee ar2,
            double totalFee,
            double homeClubFee,
            double awayClubFee,
            double adminFee)
        This constructor is called when the games are loaded from the database.
        Parameters:
        game_id - the ID assigned by the database.
        home - The home club.
        away - The away club.
        division - The division the game is in.
        round - The round the game is played in.
        year - The year the game takes place (defaults to current year)
        main - The main referee (centre referee).
        ar1 - The 1st Assistant Referee.
        ar2 - The 2nd Assistant Referee.
        totalFee - The total match fee to be paid by clubs for referees.
        homeClubFee - The amount payable by the Home Club.
        awayClubFee - The amount payable by the Away Club.
        adminFee - 10% of the fee is for administration.

      • Game

        public Game(Club home,
            Club away,
            Division division,
            int round,
            Referee main,
            Referee ar1,
            Referee ar2)
        This constructor is called when the games are entered via the GUI
        Parameters:
        home - The home club
        away - The away club
        division - The division the game is in
        round - The round the game is played in
        main - The main referee (centre referee)
        ar1 - The 1st Assistant Referee
        ar2 - The 2nd Assistant Referee

      • makeGameFees

        public double makeGameFees(boolean replacementMainReferee)
        Make the game fees ready to add to the referees afterwards. This function adds the required fees to the clubs automatically. It also calculates the 10% required.
        Parameters:
        replacementMainReferee - True if the centre referee was replaced (i.e. injury)
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of the game fees.

      • payReferee

        public void payReferee(boolean replacementMainReferee,
                       Referee replacement)
        Pays the referees for the game (it sets it into the db)
        Parameters:
        replacementMainReferee - True if the centre referee was replaced (i.e. injury)
        replacement - The replacement referee, so they can be paid. Only used if previous is true

        public java.lang.String toString()
